amendment.description: Amendment ensures that ACA open enrollment data is disaggregated by race, ethnicity, preferred language, age and sex to support better understanding of enrollment information.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 67 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to ensure that ACA open enrollment data is disaggregated by race, ethnicity, preferred language, age and sex to support better understanding of enrollment information.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A064) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 183 (Roll no. 313).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A064) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 183 (Roll no. 313).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A064) offered by Ms. Porter.
